chooserole: Choose your role to get started
droledesc: Join our network to manage patients, schedule appointments, and provide quality care
proledesc: Sign up to book appointments, view medical records, and connect with healthcare providers
herotext: Your all-in-one platform for appointments and online consultations. Stay connected with your doctor and manage your health easily.
aboutdesc1: With over 20 years of experience, our clinic has been at the forefront of healthcare innovation. We combine traditional medical expertise with modern technology to provide the best possible care for our patients.
aboutdesc2: Our team of dedicated healthcare professionals is committed to your wellbeing, offering personalized treatment plans and compassionate care every step of the way.
servdesc: We offer a comprehensive range of digital health services designed to make healthcare more accessible and convenient for you
easydesc: Book doctor appointments quickly and manage your health schedule online.
virtualdesc: Meet your doctor online anytime through secure video consultations.
digitaldesc: Receive your medical notes and prescriptions instantly after each session.
smartdesc: Get instant recommendations for the right speciality based on your symptoms.
readytext: Ready to Transform Your Healthcare Experience ?
haveques: Have questions? We're here to help. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
healthtxt: Providing trusted medical care and innovative health solutions to improve your well-being.

terms_cancel_12h: You can cancel an appointment up to 12 hours before the scheduled time for a full refund.
terms_cancel_6h: Cancellations made less than 12 hours before the appointment will refund 85% of your payment.
terms_doctor_cancel: If the doctor cancels the session, you‚Äôll automatically receive a full refund.

upload_union_card_desc: Required to access services and appointments

must_be_approved: You must be approved by the admin before you can set your availability.
toggle_days_hours: Toggle the days you're available and set your working hours. Patients will be able to book appointments based on your schedule.
start_creating_service_desc: Start by creating your first service to begin accepting appointments.
scheduled_appointments_appear: Your scheduled appointments will appear here
terms_introduction_text: Welcome to MediLink. By using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our services.
terms_booking_1: All appointments must be booked through the MediLink platform.
terms_booking_2: You must provide accurate and complete information when booking an appointment.
terms_booking_3: Appointment availability is subject to doctor's schedule and may change without prior notice.
terms_booking_4: You will receive a confirmation email once your appointment is successfully booked.
terms_no_show: Failure to attend a scheduled appointment without prior cancellation will result in no refund.
terms_payment_1: All payments must be made in advance through the platform's secure payment gateway.
terms_payment_2: Prices are displayed in Egyptian Pounds (EGP) and are subject to change.
terms_payment_3: Refunds will be processed according to the cancellation policy stated above.
terms_payment_4: Payment receipts will be sent to your registered email address.
terms_medical_info_1: You are responsible for providing accurate medical history and current health information.
terms_medical_info_2: All medical records and prescriptions are stored securely and are accessible only to you and your healthcare providers.
terms_medical_info_3: MediLink does not provide medical advice. All consultations are conducted by licensed healthcare professionals.
terms_medical_info_4: In case of emergency, please contact emergency services immediately instead of using the platform.
terms_privacy_1: We are committed to protecting your personal and medical information.
terms_privacy_2: Your data is encrypted and stored securely in compliance with data protection regulations.
terms_privacy_3: We will never share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.
terms_privacy_4: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time.
terms_user_responsibilities_1: You must maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials.
terms_user_responsibilities_2: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
terms_user_responsibilities_3: You must not use the platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms_user_responsibilities_4: You must respect the privacy and rights of other users and healthcare providers.
terms_liability_text: MediLink acts as a platform connecting patients with healthcare providers. We are not responsible for the quality of medical services provided by doctors. Any medical malpractice claims should be directed to the healthcare provider directly.
terms_changes_text: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Users will be notified of any significant changes via email. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms_contact_text: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms and conditions, please contact us:
